name: Shizuko's Upsettingly Wooly Adventure!
description:
Shizuko's Upsettingly Wooly Adventure! is a game about a girl named Shizuko who is turned into a sheepgirl by a dastardly spell that was meant to make her fall under the command of an evil-ish witch. Now with a group of like cursed individuals she sets out to track down the witch and get her true form back.

*Side view battle.
*Exciting No Overworld Map gameplay.
